## PersistenceService.load() method

Load a data-package file from zip file contents.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
load(file: BaseFile): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  file | BaseFile | The zip file containing the data-package to load |
